alert.note: Alert for Thomas (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 11 at 7:41PM CDT until May 11 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN THOMAS COUNTY... At 741 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles south of Levant, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Colby. This includes Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 36 and 38, and between mile markers 56 and 57. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 800 PM CDT for northwestern Kansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
